text: Ani jara tyance tonda phiravine tumhala asahya hota asela tara tumacyane he sakya asela tara jaminita ekhade bhuyara kinva akasata (cadhuna janyasathi) ekhadi sidi sodha ani tyanna ekhada mojija (camatkara) anuna dakhava. Allahane icchile asate tara tya sarvanna satya margavara jama kele asate. Yastava nadana lokampaiki ho'u naka
